Item.Name: Crockett's Tavern
Item.Content:
Crockett's Tavern in The Campsites at Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort, The Campsites at Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Crockett's Tavern

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001437.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Rustle up some drinks and eats at the walk-up window beside Pioneer Hall and enjoy ’em in a rocking chair on the front porch: pizzas, wings in 3 flavors and loaded nachos. Beer—draft and bottled—and wine are also available.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Meadow Snack Bar
Item.Content:
Meadow Snack Bar in The Campsites at Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort, The Campsites at Disney's Fort Wilderness Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Meadow Snack Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002223.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Go grazing in the great outdoors. Open-air eats include fresh salads, tasty sandwiches and light snacks. Top it off with a Mickey's Ice Cream Bar. Beer, sodas and smoothies are also available.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
